description: Devold® Duo Active is knitted with a fine Merino wool outer layer with organic wool from Argentina and ThermoLite® inner layer. ThermoLite® is a high function fibre designed for optimal moisture transport, while the Merino wool has supreme insulating properties and ensures that you stay warm even if you get wet.
name: Devold Duo Active Merino 205 LS Shirt - Mens
